name: Bad Luck Cat
description:
BLC is a road crossing game in which you play as a black cat. Unlike the traditional road crossing games, crossing the road safely will not score you any points!

Created in 3 days for Wowie Jam 3.0. The topic was: "FAILURE IS PROGRESS: Let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing".

HOW TO PLAY

Move: arrow keys

You have one minute to create as much chaos as possible. Make cars crash into eachother, and into other objects!

CREDITS

shadowsora - programming, music

bluchu - art

Assets used:

SFX: 8-Bit Sound Effects [100+ SFX] by Beep Yeah!
